description: Change of use of building from shop, office, warehouse and residential flats (Use classes A1, A3, B1, B8 & C4) to residential units (Use class C3) to provide thirty-six self-contained flats within a four storey building including accommodation in the roof space incorporating part 2, part 3 storey side extension with associated cycle parking, bin storage and amenity space (following part demolition of buildings)
